I made a #bitcoin variant throughput visualization focused on megabytes per hour.   1: $BTC, $LTC & $BCH   2: + $DGB & $BSV for scale.   The visual assumes 1mb for BTC (I know muh Segwit brings it up to 4ish), and 2000mb for BSV which is the current software limit. #bigblocks  https://t.co/01AXolYaLJ
